newsitem.title: CANADA: Thunder Bay vessel clearances - Oct 22.
newsitem.headline: Thunder Bay vessel clearances - Oct 22.

text.p: Daily vessel clearances at Thunder Bay, Ontario:
Date Vessel Cargo (Tonnes) Destination
Oct 20 Mantadoc 15,652 wheat St. Lawrence Ports
Oct 20 Canadian Mariner 25,249 wheat St. Lawrence Ports
Oct 20 Nanticoke 11,266 wheat Halifax, Windsor
Oct 20 Nanticoke 8,941 canola Halifax, Windsor
Oct 20 Nanticoke 5,250 barley Halifax, Windsor
Oct 19 Ocean Leader 19,800 oats Foreign Port
Oct 19 Canadian Ranger 15,714 wheat St. Lawrence Ports
Oct 19 Canadian Ranger 7,848 barley St. Lawrence Ports
Oct 18 Federal Agno 12,000 solin Foreign Port
Oct 18 Federal Agno 6,100 flax Foreign Port
Oct 18 Verily 16,800 peas Foreign Port
Oct 18 Handy Laker 17,152 wheat Foreign Port
Oct 17 Algowood coal Nanticoke
Oct 17 Canadian Olympic coal Nanticoke
Oct 17 John B. Aird coal Detroit
Oct 16 Oakglen 15,301 wheat Goderich
Oct 16 Oakglen 3,467 barley Goderich
Source: Lake Shippers Clearance Assn. M=meal,P=pellets,O=oil
--Gilbert Le Gras 204-947-3548
